summary: Join Workleap as a Software Developer II in Platform Services to deliver high-quality projects and collaborate with a dynamic team.
responsibilities: Collaborate with product managers, designers, and developers
Take ownership of features and systems
Identify and prioritize technical and product-related issues
Improve technical skills and stay updated with emerging technologies
qualifications: 3–6 years of experience in backend or full-stack Web or SaaS application development
Strong proficiency in C#/.NET or similar OOP language/framework
Experience with PostgreSQL, MongoDB or other Relational/NoSQL databases
Familiarity with Azure cloud services and Azure DevOps or similar cloud platforms
